original_text: Some people will say to you, “I am the Messiah!” Other people will say, “I am a prophet from God.” But their words will be false. They will do strange and powerful things for people to see. If possible, they would even deceive the people that God has chosen.
korean_text: 거짓 그리스도들과 거짓 선지자들이 일어나 큰 표적과 기사를 보여 할 수만 있으면 택하신 자들도 미혹하리라

sentences.original_text: Some people will say to you
I am a prophet from God
But their words will be false
They will do strange and powerful things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 기이하고 강력한 일들을 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: they would even deceive the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 심지어 그 사람들을 속이려고 할 것이다
